name: Tangy Veggie Chili

ingredients.name: Cha Cha Chili Seasoning or Pulled Pork Seasoning

preparation: Heat oil in a fry pan over medium-high; add mushrooms. Cook, stirring frequently 5 min.
Stir in seasoning, pepper, corn, beans, chickpeas, tomatoes and water; simmer for 10 min or until veggies are tender.
Spoon into bowls and garnish with toppings, if desired.
tips: Prep ahead with a double batch of chili; portion and freeze. Defrost in the microwave using a Multipurpose Steamer.
Swap Cha Cha Chili Seasoning for Chili or Pulled Pork Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed greens and 1 tsp Epicure salad dressing.

products.name: Chili Seasoning (1001136)

summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Pulled Pork Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: This seasoning is a shortcut to the south when you’re in the mood for some BBQ! Grab a slow cooker and let the pork slowly infuse with notes of deep, sweet ‘n tangy barbecue and a hint of smokiness. So good!
